<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Returns the timer for the specified pass invocation of \\p PassID.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Each time it creates a new timer.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/timer">Timer</a> &amp;TimePassesHandler::getPassTimer(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> PassID, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IsPass) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/timergroup">TimerGroup</a> &amp;TG = IsPass ? PassTG : AnalysisTG;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!PerRun) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal">    TimerVector &amp;Timers = TimingData&#91;PassID&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Timers.size() == 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal">      Timers.emplace&#95;back(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">new</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/timer">Timer</a>(PassID, PassID, TG));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;Timers.front();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Take a vector of Timers created for this \\p PassID and append</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// one more timer to it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="normal">  TimerVector &amp;Timers = TimingData&#91;PassID&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a> = Timers.size() + 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::string FullDesc = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a653cce37b80c03eebe7a00520a8eabb6">formatv</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;&#123;0&#125; #&#123;1&#125;&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, PassID, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>).str();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal">  Timer &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">new</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Timer(PassID, FullDesc, TG);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal">  Timers.emplace&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
